article.headline: Ark.-Little Rock 67, Louisiana-Lafayette 60
article.story: LITTLE ROCK, Ark. -- John Fowler scored 17 points to help lead Arkansas-Little Rock to a 67-60 victory Saturday night over Louisiana-Lafayette. Fowler scored 10 points from the free-throw line in the win for Arkansas-Little Rock (22-7, 15-3). Mike Smith contributed 14 points for the Trojans in their last regular season game before heading to the Sun Belt Conference Tournament. Arkansas-Little Rock took a 39-30 lead into halftime. The Trojans scored 21 points from the bench and 22 points in the paint during the game. Louisiana-Lafayette (10-19, 7-11) could only tie the game once and never took the lead in the loss. They scored 28 points from the bench and 12 in the paint. Chris Gradnigo led the Ragin' Cajuns with 17 points.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
